enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve updating the fakeValuesInterfaceMap with new locale-specific data.
Both methods involve adding locale-specific data to the fakeValuesInterfaceMap, though one uses a URL and the other a Path.
fetchObject may need to be invoked before updateFakeValuesInterfaceMap to ensure the locale-specific data is available.
getCachedFakeValue is directly invoked within updateFakeValuesInterfaceMap to retrieve or initialize FakeValuesInterface for each locale.
